data.description:
Bangladesh University of  Business and Technology  (BUBT) organized a virtual Orientation  Program for Spring 2021 Students on April 22, 2021.
Professor Dr. Md. Fayyaz Khan,  Hon'ble Vice-Chancellor, BUBT was the session chair of  the program while Prof. Mian Lutfar Rahman, member, BUBT Trust  and Prof  Dr. MD Ali Noor, Pro. Vice Chancellor were the special Guests.
Deans of all faculties, Registrar, Controller of Exam, Director of  IQAC-BUBT, Proctor, Chairmen of departments, Faculty members, Students and Officials were connected.
The session chair and other speakers welcomed newly admitted students. They said BUBT is ready with all facilities for the students. If they utilize them, they can build a good career.
data.title: Virtual Orientation for Spring 2021 Students at BUBT
